actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize a pilot program within the nationally significant freight and highway projects program to increase State infrastructure investments, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
Crossroads of America Act of 2019

This bill establishes a pilot program to award grants for freight and highway projects of national or regional significance.

The Department of Transportation must give priority to entities that provide the greatest non-federal share of the cost of a project relative to other applications under the pilot program and allot specified percentages of grant funds for small projects and rural projects.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize a pilot program within the nationally significant freight and highway projects program to increase State infrastructure investments, and for other purposes.
